roleset.name: to raise or lift
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to elevate.01. Elevate.01 is a member of Vn class put_direction-9.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: Velocities are elevated to 196 cm/sec in the left distal common or proximal external iliac artery.
example.arg: in the left distal common or proximal external iliac artery.

example.name: static endpoint
example.text: The CEA is elevated at 7.8 although patient was a long-time smoker.
example.arg: although the patient was a long-time smoker.
